// Pivot 0, 0
int flipper[16] = {
	1, 8,
	9, 1,
	73, 4,
	79, 9,
	79, 17,
	74, 21,
	10, 25,
	1, 18
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float flipper[16] = {
	0.012500f, 0.307692f,
	0.112500f, 0.038462f,
	0.912500f, 0.153846f,
	0.987500f, 0.346154f,
	0.987500f, 0.653846f,
	0.925000f, 0.807692f,
	0.125000f, 0.961538f,
	0.012500f, 0.692308f
};
